inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of invasive breast cancer which is: Unifocal or multifocal (not multicentric)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient has a cytologically confirmed breast cancer.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The tumor is located in the left upper outer quadrant.

inclusion.criterion: Moderate or strongly hormone receptor positive
inclusion.label: not_met
met
inclusion.evidence: The tumor is HER2-positive, but this is not a criterion for exclusion.

inclusion.criterion: Ductal grade 1 or 2, or lobular any grade, or pure tubular (any grade) or pure papillary (any grade)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The tumor is a 3 cm invasive ductal breast carcinoma.

inclusion.criterion: Stage pT1N0 (tumor </= 20mm, negative node) or pT2N0 (tumor 21-50mm, node negative)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Axillary sampling revealed 5 positive lymph nodes.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is a postmenopausal woman.

inclusion.criterion: Subject must be age > 50 years at breast cancer diagnosis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is 45 years old, but this is not a criterion for exclusion.

inclusion.criterion: Subject may be pre, peri, or postmenopausal.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject must have a > 5-year life expectancy based on physician judgement of subject's co-morbid illnesses and age
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject must undergo standard of care loco-regional management (sentinel node biopsy and/or axillary dissection; breast conserving surgery or mastectomy)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is a candidate for tumor resection and agrees to do so prior to chemotherapy.

inclusion.criterion: Surgery will have been no more than 24 weeks prior to endocrine therapy start.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The breast surgery will have achieved negative surgical margins.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No (neoadjuvant or adjuvant) chemotherapy given or planned for this breast cancer
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient will undergo chemotherapy prior to endocrine therapy.

exclusion.criterion: No other non-breast cancer within the last 5 years, except non-melanoma skin cancer, melanoma in situ, cervix carcinoma in situ, and anal carcinoma in situ
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a HER2-positive tumor, but this is not a criterion for exclusion. The patient will undergo chemotherapy prior to endocrine therapy.
